title: NOETH: Cardano for Science
description: Most PC users spend an average of 20% of their CPUs processing power. This is a strategic resource for scientists in developing countries.
solution: We propose a protocol that incentivizes PC users to lend their idle processing power in exchange for a reward, the NOETH token.
